title: Categories
description: Categories are the user-facing list of actions/triggers of the adapter. This section contains information that powers the UI for designtime configuration.

displayName.description: The field name of the group that shows up in the user interface.

description.description: The description of the group that shows up in the user interface as a tooltip.

name.description: The name of the group which is a selectable item value in the user interface.

displayName.description: The name of the group that shows up as a selectable item in the user interface.

description.description: The description of the group that shows up in the user interface as a tooltip.
